name: Ageless Guardian
flavor_text: Ancient ruins dot the world of Arcavios, most older than Strixhaven itself and many still guarded by soldiers from the Blood Age, centuries after their deaths.

name: Arcane Subtraction
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: The class learned little that day.

name: Archway Commons
oracle_text:
Archway Commons enters the battlefield tapped.
When Archway Commons enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Arrogant Poet
oracle_text: Whenever Arrogant Poet attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I would be kinder to my peers, Professor, but I simply don't have any."

name: Bayou Groff
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.
flavor_text:
"Groffs are great for tracking pests through the muck, but securing the pests before the groff devours them is a dicey endeavor."
—Lisette, Witherbloom dean

name: Beaming Defiance
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"I've lived too long in my father's shadow. It's time to find my own light."
—Killian, Silverquill mage-student

name: Biblioplex Assistant
oracle_text:
Flying
When Biblioplex Assistant enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining."
—Isabough of the Biblioplex

name: Big Play
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"Quandrix is running out of time. If they're going to capture the Witherbloom mascot, they need something big here."
—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

name: Biomathematician
oracle_text: When Biomathematician enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on each Fractal you control.
flavor_text: "I will reach infinity."

name: Blood Age General
oracle_text: {T}: Attacking Spirits get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His troops took the Fortress of Caerdoon centuries ago, yet he fights on.

name: Blood Researcher
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Researcher.
flavor_text: "Dean Valentin warns us not to consume the samples for our safety, but I think he's just being greedy."

name: Burrog Befuddler
oracle_text:
Flash
When Burrog Befuddler enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Students who seek river herbs in Doradur quickly find themselves slightly damp and thoroughly surrounded.

name: Bury in Books
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.
Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.
flavor_text: There are no weapons allowed in the Biblioplex, but a clever mage is never truly defenseless.

name: Campus Guide
oracle_text: When Campus Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor_text: "There's nowhere in Strixhaven I can't find. Where do you need to go?"

name: Charge Through
oracle_text:
Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"What a move! Lorehold gets caught flat-footed, and Witherbloom barrels ahead."
—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

name: Cogwork Archivist
oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"It's the largest library in the Multiverse. Of course it has the largest librarians."
—Kasmina

name: Combat Professor
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Before Yovus was cut down at Pranticle Peak, she performed which maneuver? Anyone? From the reading?"

name: Cram Session
oracle_text:
You gain 4 life.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: The only thing more delicious than a top grade is Gyome's signature cake.

name: Crushing Disappointment
oracle_text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.
flavor_text: Most students could barely endure Dean Embrose's scrutiny for a semester or two; Killian lived with it his entire life.

name: Curate
oracle_text:
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "*Kathorran War Chants, Vol. III*? That doesn't even belong in this wing!"

name: Defend the Campus
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: Professors scrambled to push the mage hunters back, leaving the heart of Strixhaven undefended.

name: Dragon's Approach
oracle_text:
Dragon's Approach deals 3 damage to each opponent. You may exile Dragon's Approach and four cards named Dragon's Approach from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
A deck can have any number of cards named Dragon's Approach.

name: Eager First-Year
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Eager First-Year gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Today, she learns the basics. She'll knock out advanced theory later this week.

name: Elemental Masterpiece
oracle_text:
Create two 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature tokens.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Elemental Masterpiece: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Rootha passed with flying, living colors.

name: Elemental Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
flavor_text:
"You've made a splash. Now show me a torrent."
—Uvilda, Prismari dean

name: Enthusiastic Study
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: "If the pen is mightier than the sword, just think what a giant tome could do!"

name: Environmental Sciences
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: First-years quickly learn how the Vastlands earned its name.

name: Essence Infusion
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I'd say it's still a fair fight—now my friend is about the size of your ego."

name: Eureka Moment
oracle_text: Draw two cards. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "At first, the equations were simply numbers. But in those numbers, I saw a story, and in that story I saw a pattern, and suddenly it all fit together!"

name: Excavated Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}, {T}: Mill a card. (Put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"Don't be fooled by the quiet. These old stones are trying to talk to you."
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Exhilarating Elocution
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His words poured forth on waves of golden light, scouring all fear from his audience's hearts and minds.

name: Expanded Anatomy
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Changing the equation from incremental to exponential was a stroke of genius on my part."

name: Expel
oracle_text: Exile target tapped creature.
flavor_text: Quintorius was a daydreamer, far happier digging through history books than practicing battle tactics. He agreed with the military academy on only one thing: he did not belong in their ranks.

name: Field Trip
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: First Day of Class
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it gains haste until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Fractal Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text:
"Fractals are just pseudo-dimensional manifestations of asynchronous biosymmetries. It's really quite simple."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

name: Frost Trickster
oracle_text:
Flying
When Frost Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: The most important skill in a Mage Tower match is keeping one's cool.

name: Fuming Effigy
oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, Fuming Effigy deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Some spirits share ancient wisdom. Others just get mad you touched their stuff.

name: Guiding Voice
oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: When honormancers work together, their compliments are complementary.

name: Heated Debate
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)
Heated Debate deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "While you were wasting time with abstract equations, I mastered ancient Oggyar fire magic. Your move."

name: Hunt for Specimens
oracle_text:
Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Illustrious Historian
oracle_text: {5}, Exile Illustrious Historian from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: The most distinguished Lorehold professors are eligible to receive extended tenure, even beyond the limits of their own mortality.

name: Infuse with Vitality
oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target creature gains deathtouch and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Dina raised her cup to Killian's lips, and for the first time in his life, he knew compassion.

name: Inkling Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
flavor_text:
"Think of an insult so vicious, so vulgar, that you hesitate to speak it aloud. The strongest, most aggressive inklings are born from such scorn."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

name: Introduction to Annihilation
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.
flavor_text:
"I've never seen a student fail quite so spectacularly. There's potential in that."
—Hostram, professor of arcanochemistry

name: Introduction to Prophecy
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card.
flavor_text: Final grades are posted on the first day of class.

name: Lash of Malice
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The strongest shadow spells come from disdain for someone else, not frustration with yourself."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

name: Leech Fanatic
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Leech Fanatic has lifelink.
flavor_text: "Everyone thinks that leeches maintain a strictly sanguivorous diet, but in fact, most freshwater leeches are carnivores. Wait, where are you going?"

name: Letter of Acceptance
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Letter of Acceptance: Draw a card.
flavor_text: The letter unfolded, inviting the twins to Strixhaven. Will saw a chance for arcane study. Rowan saw a chance for power.

name: Leyline Invocation
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of lands you control.
flavor_text:
"Do you still believe my work is nothing but dry, boring equations?"
—Cairu, Quandrix mage-student

name: Lorehold Campus
oracle_text:
Lorehold Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students obsessed with the secrets of the past choose Lorehold, the college of archaeomancy.

name: Lorehold Pledgemage
oracle_text:
First strike
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Lorehold Pledgemage gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The weight of history can empower you or it can crush you. It's your choice."

name: Mage Duel
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've cast another instant or sorcery spell this turn.
Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Then it fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: "Remember the rules. No spells to the face!"

name: Mage Hunters' Onslaught
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Extus stood before his alma mater for a moment, remembering first his studies, then his vengeance. At his command, the mage hunters unfolded.

name: Make Your Mark
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: Those who do learn from history may still choose to repeat it.

name: Moldering Karok
oracle_text: Trample, lifelink
flavor_text: Necroluminescence is common among the undead creatures of Sedgemoor, giving the midnight swamp an eerie glow. It's comforting—from a distance.

name: Needlethorn Drake
oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch
flavor_text: As they learn to fly, young drakes have a tendency to accidentally impale trees, cliffs, and unsuspecting students.

name: Novice Dissector
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "The professor said to first extract the venom glands, then the acid sac. Next up, the . . . meeping organ?"

name: Oggyar Battle-Seer
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: "May Ganathog bless us with bloody visions of glory restored!"

name: Owlin Shieldmage
oracle_text:
Flying
Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
flavor_text: "Aim higher next time."

name: Pest Summoning
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor_text:
"Step 1: Put the pests in mud.
"Step 2: Wait."
—*Gyome's Guide to Pest Breeding*

name: Pigment Storm
oracle_text: Pigment Storm deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
flavor_text: When art projects collapse, Prismari students revel in the beauty of destruction. Everyone else runs for cover.

name: Pilgrim of the Ages
oracle_text:
When Pilgrim of the Ages enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{6}: Return Pilgrim of the Ages from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Pillardrop Rescuer
oracle_text:
Flying
When Pillardrop Rescuer enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Gentle hands of stone whisk the careless from the crumbling ruins of Pillardrop.

name: Pillardrop Warden
oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pillardrop Warden: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: A giant statue of a dwarf is still a giant statue.

name: Pop Quiz
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: "Today is hydromancy? I thought it was amplimancy! I studied for amplimancy!"

name: Prismari Campus
oracle_text:
Prismari Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students who see spellcraft as the highest form of expression choose Prismari, the college of elemental arts.

name: Prismari Pledgemage
oracle_text:
Defender
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Prismari Pledgemage can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: Many have the talent to create, but few have the courage to share their creations.

name: Professor of Zoomancy
oracle_text: When Professor of Zoomancy enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
flavor_text: She's brilliant, if a bit overbearing.

name: Professor's Warning
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: Professor Onyx urged the twins to prepare for the dark mage Extus, sounding very much like someone familiar with the rise of tyrants.

name: Promising Duskmage
oracle_text: When Promising Duskmage dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Your technique is sloppy, but there is talent there. Do it again, and keep your right arm in position this time."

name: Quandrix Campus
oracle_text:
Quandrix Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students who see beauty in patterns and equations choose Quandrix, the college of numeromancy.

name: Quandrix Pledgemage
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Quandrix Pledgemage.
flavor_text: "The first step toward transcending physical limitations is discarding assumptions about what is possible."

name: Reckless Amplimancer
oracle_text: {4}{G}: Double Reckless Amplimancer's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Linear growth? What am I, a first-year?"

name: Reject
oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays {3}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Grux, for the last time, you have to do more than simply shout 'Apply!' at the administrators."
—Pavil, admissions officer

name: Relic Sloth
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: When it comes to transporting priceless, delicate artifacts, safety is more important than speed.

name: Resculpt
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
flavor_text: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.

name: Rise of Extus
oracle_text:
Exile target creature. Exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: With one lethal strike, Extus took control of the Oriq and took his first step towards vengeance.

name: Scurrid Colony
oracle_text:
Reach
Scurrid Colony gets +2/+2 as long as you control eight or more lands.
flavor_text: Scurrid teeth evolved to crack open nuts, but they work just as well for crushing bones if the nest is threatened.

name: Serpentine Curve
oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is one plus the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Math bites."
—Bim, Lorehold mage-student

name: Silverquill Campus
oracle_text:
Silverquill Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students drawn to the power of language choose Silverquill, the college of eloquence.

name: Silverquill Pledgemage
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Silverquill Pledgemage gains your choice of flying or lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I avoid violence. It is the last resort of the witless. But if you insist, I'll make an exception for you."

name: Soothsayer Adept
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: One of the first lessons divination students learn is how to recognize the difference between a portent and a simple surface ripple.

name: Spectacle Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Instant and sorcery spells you cast with mana value 5 or greater cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: "It would be a crime to withhold my light from the world."

name: Specter of the Fens
oracle_text:
Flying
{5}{B}: Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Foul specters hunt down those who try to back out of a deal with a daemogoth.

name: Spined Karok
flavor_text:
"The bogs are deeper than you realize. Most of the space beneath the surface is taken up by these enormous karoks. You might think your feet are touching the bottom. They're probably not."
—Gyome, Witherbloom chef

name: Spirit Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text:
"Books are fantastic, but if you're really curious about the distant past, why not ask someone who was there?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Spiteful Squad
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Spiteful Squad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
When Spiteful Squad dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
flavor_text: "Don't you know first-years pay a toll to walk through here?"

name: Springmane Cervin
oracle_text: When Springmane Cervin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Cervins feed on the mana-rich plants around the star arches, imbuing their bodies with extraordinary grace and vitality.

name: Square Up
oracle_text: Target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes the most radical thing you can do is think inside the box.

name: Star Pupil
oracle_text:
Star Pupil enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Star Pupil dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
flavor_text: "When I'm done here, they'll name entire buildings after me."

name: Stonebound Mentor
oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, scry 1.
flavor_text: Quintorius beamed, his mind eager to absorb every historical fact the spirit wanted to divulge.

name: Stonerise Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
{4}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The carved cliffs of Pillardrop thrum with the sounds of ancient spirits rising from the past.

name: Study Break
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: "You've been cramming all night. You're taking a nap whether you like it or not."

name: Sudden Breakthrough
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Rootha created constantly, passionately, in hopes of impressing her greatest critic: herself.

name: Tangletrap
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Tangletrap deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"It's like that old saying: what goes up . . . feeds the arboretum."
—Lisette, Witherbloom dean

name: Teach by Example
oracle_text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text:
"Learning to imitate a master is the first step in becoming one."
—Uvilda, Prismari dean

name: Thrilling Discovery
oracle_text: You gain 2 life. Then you may discard two cards. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"This must be the lost city of Zantafar, where my people lived before becoming nomads. Think of the history we'll learn here!"
—Quintorius, Lorehold mage-student

name: Tome Shredder
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on Tome Shredder.
flavor_text:
"Quintorius, would you care to explain why you didn't complete your homework?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Twinscroll Shaman
oracle_text: Double strike
flavor_text: "May your wretched name never grace the annals of history, you ignorant buffoon!"

name: Unwilling Ingredient
oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Exile Unwilling Ingredient from your graveyard: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Don't look at me like that. It was either this or being eaten by a groff."
—Dina, Witherbloom mage-student

name: Vortex Runner
oracle_text: As long as you control eight or more lands, Vortex Runner gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
flavor_text: "By using the vortex, I can study for at least fifteen extra minutes between every class. I wasn't being reckless, Dean Imbraham. I was being efficient."

name: Waterfall Aerialist
oracle_text:
Flying
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
flavor_text: Form and function in perfect unity.

name: Witherbloom Campus
oracle_text:
Witherbloom Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students fascinated by the energies of life and death choose Witherbloom, the college of essence studies.

name: Witherbloom Pledgemage
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Death is just a transfer of energy. Those pests I harvested have the honor of becoming pure magic. What could be more beautiful?"
